templates.template: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN"> <HTML> <HEAD> <META NAME="generator" CONTENT="${PLUGIN_NAME}"> <TITLE>Untitled</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY BGCOLOR=#FFFFFF> </BODY> </HTML>

template.name: webobjects application project file
template.description: basic project file with main component and application class

template.name: webobjects framework project file
template.description: basic project file with main component and application class

template.name: ant file woapplication
template.description: basic project file with main component and application class

templates.template:
<project name="${PROJECT_NAME}" default="build" basedir=".">
<target name="build"> <property environment="env"/> <property name="wo.woroot" value="${env.NEXT_ROOT}"/> <condition property="wo.root" value="/System"> <and> <os family="mac" /> <os family="unix" /> </and> </condition> <woapplication name="${PROJECT_NAME}" destDir="."> <classes dir="bin"> </classes> <resources dir="."> <include name="*.eomodeld/**"/> <include name="*.wo/**"/> <include name="*.api"/> </resources> <wsresources dir="."> <include name="Images/**"/> </wsresources> </woapplication> </target>
</project>

template.name: ant file woframework
template.description: basic project file with main component and application class

templates.template:
<project name="${projectname}" default="build" basedir=".">
<target name="build"> <property environment="env"/> <property name="wo.woroot" value="${env.NEXT_ROOT}"/> <condition property="wo.root" value="/System"> <and> <os family="mac" /> <os family="unix" /> </and> </condition> <woframework name="${PROJECT_NAME}" destDir="."> <classes dir="bin"> </classes> <resources dir="."> <include name="*.eomodeld/**"/> <include name="*.wo/**"/> <include name="*.api"/> </resources> <wsresources dir="."> <include name="Images/**"/> </wsresources> </woframework> </target>
</project>

template.name: webobjects makefile
template.description: basic make file with main component and application class
